name: Laporan Monitoring RAP
query:
SELECT 
    b.pos_rap, 
    b.account account_1,
    b.account_um account_2,
    b.income_amount rencana, 
    (coalesce(c.realisasi, 0)++coalesce(d.realisasi, 0)) realisasi, 
    b.income_amount-(coalesce(c.realisasi, 0)++coalesce(d.realisasi, 0)) sisa,
    case when b.income_amount-(coalesce(c.realisasi, 0)++coalesce(d.realisasi, 0)) >= 0 then 'Terkendali'
    else 'Tidak Terkendali' END keterangan,
    a.project_name
    FROM `tabIncome Account` b
INNER JOIN `tabBudget` a ON a.name = b.parent
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT SUM(c.credit-c.debit) realisasi, c.account FROM `tabGL Entry` c 
    WHERE c.posting_date <= %(end_date)s
    GROUP BY c.account) c ON c.account = b.account
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT SUM(d.credit-d.debit) realisasi, d.account FROM `tabGL Entry` d
    WHERE d.posting_date <= %(end_date)s
    GROUP BY d.account) d ON d.account = b.account_um
WHERE a.project = %(project)s AND a.docstatus = 1

UNION

SELECT 
    b.pos_rap, 
    b.account account_1,
    b.account_pdp account_2,
    b.budget_amount rencana, 
    (coalesce(c.realisasi, 0)+coalesce(d.realisasi, 0)) realisasi, 
    b.budget_amount-(coalesce(c.realisasi, 0)+coalesce(d.realisasi, 0)) sisa,
    case when b.budget_amount-(coalesce(c.realisasi, 0)+coalesce(d.realisasi, 0)) >= 0 then 'Terkendali'
    else 'Tidak Terkendali' END keterangan,
    a.project_name
    FROM `tabBudget Account` b
INNER JOIN `tabBudget` a ON a.name = b.parent
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT SUM(c.debit-c.credit) realisasi, c.account FROM `tabGL Entry` c 
    WHERE c.posting_date <= %(end_date)s
    GROUP BY c.account) c ON c.account = b.account
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT SUM(d.debit-d.credit) realisasi, d.account FROM `tabGL Entry` d
    WHERE d.posting_date <= %(end_date)s
    GROUP BY d.account) d ON d.account = b.account_pdp
WHERE a.project = %(project)s AND a.docstatus = 1
